## Public Static Functions

### isFPInductionPHI() {#adb1a03152610d15e008c2fdcb93602ed}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool InductionDescriptor::isFPInductionPHI (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; Phi, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42; SE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inductiondescriptor">InductionDescriptor</a> &amp; D)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns true if <code>Phi</code> is a floating point induction in the loop <code>L</code>.

If <code>Phi</code> is an induction, the induction descriptor <code>D</code> will contain the data describing this induction.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivdescriptors-h/#l00371">371</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivdescriptors-h">IVDescriptors.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivdescriptors-cpp/#l01311">1311</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivdescriptors-cpp">IVDescriptors.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isInductionPHI() {#acdb97daf1829f811db20dff44887fe9e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool InductionDescriptor::isInductionPHI (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; Phi, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42; SE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inductiondescriptor">InductionDescriptor</a> &amp; D, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42; Expr=nullptr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &gt; &#42; CastsToIgnore=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns true if <code>Phi</code> is an induction in the loop <code>L</code>.

If <code>Phi</code> is an induction, the induction descriptor <code>D</code> will contain the data describing this induction. Since Induction Phis can only be present inside loop headers, the function will assert if it is passed a Phi whose parent is not the loop header. If by some other means the caller has a better <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expression for <code>Phi</code> than the one returned by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> analysis, it can be passed through <code>Expr</code>. If the def-use chain associated with the phi includes casts (that we know we can ignore under proper runtime checks), they are passed through <code>CastsToIgnore</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivdescriptors-h/#l00364">364</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivdescriptors-h">IVDescriptors.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivdescriptors-cpp/#l01513">1513</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivdescriptors-cpp">IVDescriptors.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isInductionPHI() {#a5ed1bebb4f59394ccf2d92d0d73336bf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool InductionDescriptor::isInductionPHI (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; Phi, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/predicatedscalarevolution">PredicatedScalarEvolution</a> &amp; PSE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inductiondescriptor">InductionDescriptor</a> &amp; D, bool Assume=false)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns true if <code>Phi</code> is a loop <code>L</code> induction, in the context associated with the run-time predicate of PSE.

If <code>Assume</code> is true, this can add further <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> predicates to <code>PSE</code> in order to prove that <code>Phi</code> is an induction. If <code>Phi</code> is an induction, <code>D</code> will contain the data describing this induction.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivdescriptors-h/#l00380">380</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/ivdescriptors-h">IVDescriptors.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivdescriptors-cpp/#l01469">1469</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivdescriptors-cpp">IVDescriptors.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
